meanings.definition: Relating to or caused by microorganisms.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the microbian growth in the petri dish.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed antibiotics to treat the microbian infection.
meanings.sent3: The microbian party in the soil was a tiny affair.
meanings.sent4: The microbian world under the microscope was like a bustling city.
meanings.sent5: The microbian nature of the pond water was evident under the lens.

meanings.sent1: A single drop of water may contain a microbian that is invisible to the naked eye.
meanings.sent2: The microbian was responsible for breaking down the organic matter in the compost pile.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous microbian played hide-and-seek in the laboratory.
meanings.sent4: The microbian in the yogurt culture worked tirelessly to ferment the milk.
meanings.sent5: Under the microscope, the microbian appeared like a tiny, bustling city.
